greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1 + x^(7*k-1)).
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: G.f.: Sum_{k>=0} x^(k*(7*k + 5)/2) / Product_{j=1..k} (1 - x^(7*j)). - _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Nov 24 2020
mathematica: nmax = 200; CoefficientList[Series[Product[(1 + x^(7*k - 1)), {k, 1, nmax}], {x, 0, nmax}], x]
nmax = 200; poly = ConstantArray[0, nmax + 1]; poly[[1]] = 1; poly[[2]] = 0; Do[If[Mod[k, 7] == 6, Do[poly[[j + 1]] += poly[[j - k + 1]], {j, nmax, k, -1}]; ], {k, 2, nmax}]; poly
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Jan 18 2017
